title: New: Solar Bears – Cosmic Runner
content:
Having announced their return with the fantastic Keep Shelly In Athens featuring Alpha People earlier in the year, Irish duo Solar Bears are back with a new track, also to be taken from their forthcoming sophomore album. Cosmic Runner is an expansive dance influenced number, utterly addictive and completely enthralling, it’s one of those pieces of music that you never really want to end. Check it out below.
